Two people dead and one missing after boat capsizes in Riverton, Southland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-people-dead-and-one-missing-after-boat-capsizes-in-riverton-southland/UHWLLFOBJFFZZEJODG7WAKTHD4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-people-dead-and-one-missing-after-boat-capsizes-in-riverton-southland/UHWLLFOBJFFZZEJODG7WAKTHD4/ Two people were retrieved from the water and taken to Southland Hospital. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 06:03:15 +0000 Two people have died and one person is missing after a boat capsized near the Riverton bar.
Prisoner Huata Irving ingested meth bag, after being allowed out for tangi, which later burst inside him https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ Belinda FeekJudge tells Huata Irving, who was hospitalised, he's the “author of his own misfortune". Sat, 03 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A prisoner granted compassionate bail to attend the tangi of a relative killed in a horrific crash nearly died himself after ingesting a bag of meth. Photo / 123RF
Police investigating woman’s ‘unexplained’ death on Northland beach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/The woman had earlier been reported missing. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 04:44:10 +0000 The woman's body was found between Omamari and Aranga Beaches north-west of Dargaville, police say.
Quick-thinking driver alerts police to dangerous speeder, preventing potential tragedy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/quick-thinking-driver-alerts-police-to-dangerous-speeder-preventing-pottial-tragedy/7MIMUM5SXBC63KB6MGLLOU4L4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/quick-thinking-driver-alerts-police-to-dangerous-speeder-preventing-pottial-tragedy/7MIMUM5SXBC63KB6MGLLOU4L4Q/ “I didn’t quite believe it when I saw the speed on the radar, I thought ‘is that right?'" Sat, 03 Aug 2024 03:50:43 +0000 A police car radar showed an 18-year-old was driving at more than twice the open road limit. Photo / File
Five rescued from capsized boat in Manukau Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-rescued-from-capsized-boat-in-manukau-harbour/WKAD33A3NZC2BJSJU4UJXLS36Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-rescued-from-capsized-boat-in-manukau-harbour/WKAD33A3NZC2BJSJU4UJXLS36Y/ Coastguard and police attended the incident near Puketutu Island this morning. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 03:02:01 +0000 'Early this morning, our team responded to an urgent call for assistance from Police . Five individuals were found in the water with their boat having capsized in the Manukau Harbour. With the support of the Police Eagle helicopter, the airport hovercraft, and Lensesonline Rescue, we were able to successfully bring everyone to safety. We'd like to extend our gratitude to all the assisting units for their swift and professional response. Remember, safety on the water is paramount. Always ensure your equipment is in good condition and stay alert to changing conditions. Stay safe out there!'... Photo / Facebook / Papakura Coastguard
Herald afternoon quiz: August 3 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/herald-afternoon-quiz-august-3/5LOFBGYWFFAERFQL6R24GKBNC4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/herald-afternoon-quiz-august-3/5LOFBGYWFFAERFQL6R24GKBNC4/ Test your knowledge with the Herald's afternoon quiz. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Who was the engineer responsible for designing the iconic Eiffel Tower? That and more in today's Herald afternoon quiz.
One person dies after serious crash on Morrinsville-Tāhuna Rd: Two-car collision blocks Waikato road https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-crash-on-morrinsville-tahuna-rd-two-car-collision-blocks-waikato-road/IMAMPO6DUBBP3NHIPMWVCW657Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-crash-on-morrinsville-tahuna-rd-two-car-collision-blocks-waikato-road/IMAMPO6DUBBP3NHIPMWVCW657Y/ Morrinsville-Tāhuna Rd is blocked, motorists should use an alternate route. Dog ingests methamphetamine on walk through central Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dog-ingests-methamphetamine-on-walk-through-central-auckland/TBG5TU6HKFAYFOV25BA6XQHRRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dog-ingests-methamphetamine-on-walk-through-central-auckland/TBG5TU6HKFAYFOV25BA6XQHRRE/ Ben TomsettFleur's owner wants to raise awareness over rising meth use in the city. Another Auckland bus attack: Asian woman allegedly robbed on route No 70https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/another-auckland-bus-attack-asian-woman-allegedly-robbed-on-route-no-70/PI55QTMBGRFVXMQ3S4N6VO652I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/another-auckland-bus-attack-asian-woman-allegedly-robbed-on-route-no-70/PI55QTMBGRFVXMQ3S4N6VO652I/ Raphael Franks'These kids will ruin NZ’s reputation as it is not a safe place anymore.' Sat, 03 Aug 2024 01:06:27 +0000 Anna Zhang, of Auckland, was attacked by a group of teenaged children who tried stealing her Hop Card, stomped on her hand, kicked her abdomen, on bus No 70 on Symonds St. Photo / Anna Zhang
